member.name: T:UCTask.Worker.WorkerState
member.summary: An enumeration that represents the different states of a worker.

member.name: F:UCTask.Worker.WorkerState.Stopped
member.summary: Indicates that the worker is in a 'Stopped' state.

member.name: F:UCTask.Worker.WorkerState.Starting
member.summary: Indicates that the worker is in a 'Starting' state. That is, the worker is busy starting.

member.name: F:UCTask.Worker.WorkerState.Started
member.summary: Indicates that the worker is in a 'Started' state.

member.name: F:UCTask.Worker.WorkerState.Stopping
member.summary: Indicates that the worker is in a 'Stopping' state. That is, the worker is busy stopping.

member.name: T:UCTask.Worker.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:UCTask.Worker.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:UCTask.Worker.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:UCTask.Worker.WorkerBase
member.summary: An abstract base class that provides basic thread, start and stop operations.

member.name: P:UCTask.Worker.WorkerBase.WorkerState
member.summary: Represents the state of the worker.

member.name: M:UCTask.Worker.WorkerBase.StartWorker
member.summary: Starts the worker.

member.name: M:UCTask.Worker.WorkerBase.StopWorker
member.summary: Stops the worker.

member.name: M:UCTask.Worker.WorkerBase.OnRunStarting
member.summary: Implementing classes can override which is called at the beginning of a start operation.

member.name: M:UCTask.Worker.WorkerBase.Cycle(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: When overrided in a derived class, this method is executed with each cycle of the worker.

member.name: M:UCTask.Worker.WorkerBase.OnRunEnding
member.summary: Implementing classes can override which is called at the beginning of a stop operation.

member.name: M:UCTask.Worker.WorkerBase.AddDependent(UCTask.Worker.WorkerBase)
member.summary: Adds a dependent worker which is subject to the start and stop operations of this worker.
member.param: The worker which is to be added.

member.name: M:UCTask.Worker.WorkerBase.RemoveDependent(UCTask.Worker.WorkerBase)
member.summary: Removes a dependent worker.
member.param: The worker which is not to be removed.

member.name: M:UCTask.Worker.WorkerBase.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:UCTask.Worker.WorkerBase.Finalize
member.summary: Default destructor.

member.name: M:UCTask.Worker.WorkerBase.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the resources used by the component.

member.name: T:UCTask.Worker.WorkerException
member.summary: Represents errors that occur during usage of the .

member.name: M:UCTask.Worker.WorkerException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:UCTask.Worker.WorkerException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

member.name: M:UCTask.Worker.WorkerException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

member.name: M:UCTask.Worker.WorkerException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.
